Class dom.net.TCPConnection 

java.lang.Object
    |
    +----dom.net.TCPConnection
public class TCPConnection
extends java.lang.Object
implements ReliableConnection
Class to represent a TCP connection between two SessionViews. This provides a wrapper for a Socket that implements the ReliableConnection interface.

Author:
Scott Lewis
See Also:
ReliableConnection
Source Code:
TCPConnection.java
